title: Callum Wilson lifts lid on Bournemouth squad with Soccer AM's Tubes
description: Bournemouth striker Callum Wilson lifts the lid on his team-mates at the Vitality Stadium withÂ Soccer AM's Tubes.
content: The 25-year-old spilled the beans the characters inside Eddie Howe's dressing ahead of Sunday's visit of Arsenal, live on Sky Sports Premier League.Tubes caught up with Wilson as he took time out of preparations for the encounter with Arsene Wenger's side to help out a local food bank in Bournemouth.It was a poignant reminder of the difficulties he faced as a youngster living in Coventry when his family found themselves in need of donated food themselves.Hit the video at the top of the story for Wilson's Teammates 2.0 - and don't forget to watch Bournemouth v Arsenal on Nissan Super Sunday from 12.30pm on Sky Sports Premier League.
